<file path="/home/janreges/ai-distiller/testdata/java/05_very_complex/source.java">
package com.aidi.test.modern;
import java.util.stream.Stream;

interface Shape {
    double area();
}

record Circle implements Shape {
    final double radius;
    @Override
    double area();
}

final class Rectangle implements Shape {
    -final double length;
    -final double width;
    Rectangle(double length, double width);
    @Override
    double area();
}

class ModernJava {
    static void main(String[] args);
}
</file>
